summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Social Security Administration outlines 4 open recommendations that it should prioritize. For example, to protect the integrity of its Disability Insurance program, SSA must collect data to ensure it doesn't continue overpaying beneficiaries who...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Social Security Administration
